title: Introducing: All Eyes
body:
I’m a sucker for moody, female fronted acts, and Minneapolis’s **All Eyes** are exactly that.

Announcing their arrival with a couple of four minute shoegaze inspired numbers, focusing on the brooding, poignant vocals of the lead singer, backed by languid guitar sections and midi drum beats, it’s how Warpaint might sound had they been brought up listening to **The Jesus & Mary Chain**. Of the two tracks, _All I Want_ stands out as a bold first venture, threatening to turn into a track of epic proportions, guided by the fantastically seductive vocals. Despite only having eight minutes of music to their name, **All Eyes** have clearly marked themselves out as a one to watch; needless to say, I’m excited. Check out both tracks below.
